item.title: The states where abortion is on the ballot in November
item.description:
Since Roe v. Wade was overturned, state laws on abortion have been changing constantly. It will all be part of the picture as voters go to the polls in November.

item.title: How Does Israel Respond to the International Criminal Court?
item.description: The prosecutor of the International Criminal Court has announced he will seek arrest warrants for leaders of Hamas and of Israel for war crimes in Gaza. The U.S. has denounced the possible prosecution of Israeli leaders. We get response from a minister in Israel's government.

item.title: A German novel about a tortured love affair wins 2024 International Booker Prize
item.description: Jenny Erpenbeck's novel, translated by Michael Hofmann, follows a couple in 1980s East Berlin and their tumultuous relationship, while Germany undergoes its own political transformation.

item.title: New research on Antarctica's Thwaites Glacier could reshape sea-level rise predictions
item.description: At 80 miles across, Thwaites is the world's widest glacier. It has been nicknamed the "Doomsday Glacier" for the catastrophic effects its thawing could have on global sea-level rise.

item.title: Black men are a hidden segment of caregivers. It's stressful but rewarding, too
item.description: Almost 40 percent of caregivers of older adults are men, and a third of that group is Black. But African American men face some issues other guys don't.

item.title: Is Elvis' Graceland actually up for sale? His granddaughter, alleging fraud, says no
item.description: Riley Keough, Elvis' granddaughter and sole heir, says in a lawsuit that the company advertising a foreclosure sale of his Graceland property is using fraudulent documents — and may not exist at all.

item.title: Trump won't testify in his New York hush money trial
item.description: The defense for former President Donald Trump has rested in the case, marking the end of witness testimony and paving the way for jury deliberation. The jury could begin deliberating next Wednesday.
